projects.title: Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase what I have built.
keyLearnings: Modern CSS techniques including gradients and animations

projects.title: DnDScape
projects.description: A Python app that loops through stored music based on category (E.g. You are playing DnD and enter a spooky cave, the DM would select the Spooky folder and the music would fade to then loop all spooky music in a queue).
